products.name: basics. belted fitted dress
products.description: Fitted mini dress with a squared neckline and buttoned front pockets.

products.name: basics. wrap denim skort
products.description: A high waisted skort with a washed effect, designed with front and back pockets.

products.name: basics. embroided top
products.description: V-neck embroided top, perfect for a casual yet sophisticated look.

products.name: basics. asymmetric swimsuit
products.description: Swimsuit with an asymmetric neckline and embroided strap.

products.name: basics. textured t-shirt
products.description: A minimalist, yet comfort for all-day wear t-shirt with a round neckline.

products.name: basics. linen shorts
products.description: Fresh and verastile linen fabric shorts, created for comfort and ease of movement.

products.name: basics. linen shirt
products.description: Relax and fresh fit linen shirt, designed with a spread collar and short sleeves

products.name: basics. structured swimsuit
products.description: Sophisticated and elegant swimming trunks, perfect for hanging out by the pool or strolling along the beach.
